description: Complete multi-role dialogue audit trail for all development phases

phase1.name: Initial Development Setup

responsibilities: Define objectives, scope, and alignment with business goals
Make final decisions on project direction

decisions.decision: Focus on trainer content creation workflow
decisions.rationale: Provides solid foundation to build upon
decisions.impact: Establishes clear scope and user focus

decisions.decision: Use JavaScript/JSX only (no TypeScript)
decisions.rationale: Follows framework requirements for JavaScript-only development
decisions.impact: Simplifies development stack and reduces complexity

responsibilities: Define system structure and technology stack

decisions.decision: Monorepo structure with frontend, backend, database, shared directories
decisions.rationale: Enables code sharing and unified development

decisions.decision: Next.js 14 + React 18 for frontend
decisions.rationale: Latest stable versions with App Router support
decisions.impact: Modern development experience with good performance

decisions.decision: Node.js + Express + Prisma for backend
decisions.rationale: JavaScript ecosystem consistency with robust ORM
decisions.impact: Unified language stack and type safety

responsibilities: Set up environment, CI/CD pipelines, and repositories

decisions.decision: Vercel for frontend deployment
decisions.rationale: Optimized for Next.js with automatic deployments

decisions.decision: Railway for backend deployment
decisions.rationale: Node.js containers with easy scaling and deployment
decisions.impact: Reliable backend hosting with good performance

decisions.decision: Supabase for PostgreSQL database
decisions.rationale: Managed PostgreSQL with real-time capabilities

responsibilities: Define AI integration in setup and automation
Implement AI safety and validation measures

decisions.decision: Start with mock AI services initially
decisions.rationale: Allows development to proceed while AI integration is planned
decisions.impact: Enables parallel development of core features

decisions.decision: AI integration points: content enhancement, quality checking, format generation
decisions.rationale: Core AI capabilities that provide maximum value

responsibilities: Enforce logical order and guard against premature execution
Manage role conflicts and ensure consensus

decisions.decision: Sequential execution of setup components
decisions.rationale: Ensures proper dependencies and reduces errors

decisions.decision: Consensus required for all technical decisions
decisions.rationale: Ensures all perspectives are considered
decisions.impact: Higher quality decisions and team alignment

responsibilities: Capture setup configurations, confirmations, and rollback notes

decisions.decision: Comprehensive documentation of all setup decisions
decisions.rationale: Enables rollback and future reference

phase1.consensus: All roles agreed on JavaScript-only stack, monorepo structure, and trainer workflow focus
rollbackProcedures: Database schema can be reverted using Prisma migrations
Frontend can be reverted to basic Next.js setup
Backend can be reverted to basic Express server

phase2.name: User Dialogue & Requirements Analysis

responsibilities: Direct question flow and maintain conversation structure
Ensure all required information is gathered

decisions.decision: Focus on trainer content creation workflow
decisions.rationale: Establishes clear user focus for requirements gathering

decisions.decision: Progressive disclosure approach
decisions.rationale: One focused question at a time for clarity
decisions.impact: Better user understanding and requirements capture

responsibilities: Request missing data and identify gaps

decisions.decision: Define three primary user personas
decisions.rationale: Covers different technical levels and use cases

decisions.decision: Sarah - Corporate Trainer (Intermediate technical level)
decisions.rationale: Represents majority of users with guided process needs

decisions.decision: Dr. Michael - Academic Educator (Advanced technical level)
decisions.rationale: Represents power users with complex requirements

decisions.decision: Lisa - Freelance Content Creator (Beginner to Intermediate)
decisions.rationale: Represents users needing simplicity and efficiency
decisions.impact: Ensures intuitive design and quick results

responsibilities: Rewrite complex input into clear requirements
Translate technical concepts to plain language

decisions.decision: Break down complex requirements into clear user stories
decisions.rationale: Makes requirements actionable and testable

decisions.decision: Use plain language for all user-facing documentation
decisions.rationale: Ensures accessibility for non-technical users

responsibilities: Ensure requirements are testable and measurable

decisions.decision: Validate all user stories have clear acceptance criteria
decisions.rationale: Ensures testability and implementation clarity

decisions.decision: Ensure all requirements are technically feasible
decisions.rationale: Prevents scope creep and unrealistic expectations

responsibilities: Prevent scope overflow and maintain focus

decisions.decision: Maintain focus on trainer content creation workflow
decisions.rationale: Prevents scope creep and maintains project focus

decisions.decision: Resolve conflicts through consensus building
decisions.rationale: Ensures all perspectives are considered

decisions.decision: Document all user personas with detailed characteristics
decisions.rationale: Enables consistent design decisions

decisions.decision: Create comprehensive requirements traceability matrix
decisions.rationale: Ensures all requirements are addressed

phase2.consensus: All roles agreed on three primary user personas and comprehensive requirements coverage
rollbackProcedures: Requirements can be revised based on user feedback
User personas can be updated with additional research
User stories can be refined based on development constraints

phase3.name: Feature Planning

responsibilities: Prioritize MVP features and product value
Make business decisions about feature scope

decisions.decision: Use Value vs. Effort matrix for feature prioritization
decisions.rationale: Ensures maximum value delivery with optimal resource allocation

decisions.decision: Tier 1: High Value, Low Effort (Must-Have MVP)
decisions.rationale: Quick wins that provide immediate value

decisions.decision: Tier 2: High Value, Medium Effort (Core MVP)
decisions.rationale: Essential features that differentiate the product

decisions.decision: Success metrics: 40% time reduction, 4.0/5 satisfaction, 30% quality improvement
decisions.rationale: Measurable outcomes that demonstrate value

responsibilities: Assist in decomposing features into measurable tasks

decisions.decision: Identify 4 core AI integration opportunities
decisions.rationale: Maximizes AI value while maintaining feasibility

decisions.decision: Content Enhancement AI - Semi-automated with user approval
decisions.rationale: Balances automation with user control
decisions.impact: Improved content quality with user oversight

decisions.decision: Quality Assessment AI - Automated with user review
decisions.rationale: Provides consistent quality checking with human validation

decisions.decision: Format Generation AI - Semi-automated with user customization
decisions.rationale: Enables multi-format output with user preferences

decisions.decision: Content Analysis AI - Automated with user review
decisions.rationale: Provides insights while maintaining user control

responsibilities: Evaluate technical, business, and delivery risks

decisions.decision: High-risk items: AI Integration Complexity, Content Quality Requirements, Performance Under Load
decisions.rationale: Identifies critical risks that could impact delivery

decisions.decision: Mitigation: Start with mock AI services, gradual integration
decisions.rationale: Reduces AI integration risk while enabling development

decisions.decision: Contingency: Fallback to manual processes
decisions.rationale: Ensures delivery even if AI integration fails

decisions.decision: Validate all features have clear acceptance criteria
decisions.rationale: Ensures testability and implementation clarity

decisions.decision: Ensure all dependencies are mapped and validated
decisions.rationale: Prevents development blockers

decisions.decision: Validate resource requirements are realistic
decisions.rationale: Ensures achievable development timeline

responsibilities: Prevent scope creep and enforce version control

decisions.decision: Maintain MVP scope with 7 core features
decisions.rationale: Ensures deliverable scope within timeline

decisions.decision: Resolve feature conflicts through prioritization
decisions.rationale: Ensures clear development order

responsibilities: Store feature backlog and traceability links

decisions.decision: Document all feature decisions with rationale
decisions.rationale: Enables future reference and rollback

decisions.decision: Create comprehensive feature breakdown
decisions.rationale: Provides detailed implementation guidance

phase3.consensus: All roles agreed on 7 core MVP features with clear prioritization and implementation strategy
rollbackProcedures: Features can be deprioritized based on development constraints
AI integration can be simplified to mock services
Feature scope can be reduced if timeline is at risk

crossPhaseValidation.consistency: All phases maintain focus on trainer content creation workflow
crossPhaseValidation.traceability: All decisions trace back to user requirements and business objectives
crossPhaseValidation.quality: All decisions include rationale and impact assessment
crossPhaseValidation.rollback: All phases have defined rollback procedures

nextPhase.focus: System design, security foundation, AI components, reliability
